p: Methods: From January 2006 to June 2014 admitted to our ICU 620 patients. From our database we looked for incidence of VAP (% ventilation days) and the following values and indexes according FFP transfusion per year from 2006 to 2014 (mean values). Total, per patient, per hospitalization days (HD), per patient under mechanical ventilation (pts V) and per ventilation days (VD) Using linear correlation method, we looked for linear slope, correlation coefficient (r), and coefficient of determination (r2), and by linear regression method using ANOVA test we looked for p value, according VAP and FFP transfusion.
